title: Lviv
summary: Lviv (/ləˈviːv, ləˈviːf/ lə-VEEV, lə-VEEF; Ukrainian: Львів [lʲwiu̯] (listen); Polish: Lwów [lvuf] (listen); Russian: Львов [lʲvof]; German: Lemberg; see also other names) is the largest city in western Ukraine and the seventh-largest city in the country overall, with a population of  717,510 (2021 est.)[1] Lviv is one of the main cultural centres of Ukraine.
